name: Stable, Unstable
description:
Pre-covid Singapore. A migrant worker glances outside the window of a bus on Nov, 17, 2019. 

Many migrant workers come to Singapore to search for better job opportunities. Most of these workers hail from India and Bangladesh. 

Since the pandemic began, life has changed for many of them. Their movements are largely restricted and they only travel out of their dormitories for work.

Many of them are hoping to be free again.
